snippet.title: TRUST NO BUNNY Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Everybunny has a secret. Who do you trust to keep the town safe? 

Trust No Bunny is a 5-8 player social deduction mission game for fans of Avalon, Town of Salem, Among Us, or Werewolf, actively being developed by new studio Friendly Pixel. It’s a game for thinkers, schemers, and downright liars, where guessing the traitor is only half the battle.

Vote which players you’ll send on guard to protect the town from wolves each night, but beware – some of your fellow townsfolk have been acting strangely. Do they just have secret quirks, or might they be Werebunnies helping take down your defenses from within? Choose wisely who to bring and which powers to use – each night could be your last.

Hop in the Discord here: https://discord.gg/Rkxx9jKu5k 

And follow Friendly Pixel on socials for dev updates, gameplay livestreams, and more!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/friendly_pixel 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/friendlypixelgames 
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_QZva_ujbWPXZVWhhCMiFQ 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/friendlypixel 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/friendlypixel
Imgur: https://imgur.com/user/friendlypixel 
Studio site: https://www.friendlypixel.com/
